name: Trine 2: Complete Story
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/35720/extras/trine_2_gif_footage_steam_storepage_3.gif?t=1725007729[/img]

Trine 2 is a sidescrolling game of action, puzzles and platforming where you play as one of Three Heroes who make their way through dangers untold in a fantastical fairytale world.

Join Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight and Zoya the Thief in their adventure full of friendship, magic and betrayal.
 
[b]Trine 2: Complete Story[/b] fully integrates the main storyline and the Goblin Menace expansion campaign into one mighty fairytale. All owners of Trine 2: Goblin Menace are automatically upgraded to the Complete Story edition.[h2]Key Features[/h2][list][li] Complete Story edition features the all-new unlockable Dwarven Caverns level that takes our heroes on a journey through deep and dark lava-filled tunnels resonating with ancient legends
[/li][li] 20 levels chock-full of adventure, physics-based puzzles, hazards, enemies and contraptions. 
[/li][li] 3 Heroes – Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight and Zoya the Thief, each with their own skills – and personalities charming and otherwise
[/li][li] Choose new skills to aid the heroes in their quest; fight dragon fire with fire arrows or turn your goblin enemies to ice, fly across chasms with the Kitesail Shield, levitate monsters to great heights and then trap them in a box, or slow down the game world with the time-bending gravity bubble!
[/li][li] Travel through beautiful vistas and environments (sometimes using extremely unreliable methods of transportation), including a castle by the treacherous sea, a burning desert, snowy ice mountains, all the way to the insides of a giant worm
[/li][li] Accessible for both casual and core gamers
[/li][li] Online and local co-op with up to three players
[/li][li] Save anywhere to play as long or short sessions as you like and use the Unlimited Character Mode and Game+ for additional replay value
[/li][li] Superb graphics with next-gen visuals use impressive technical effects, immerse yourself in the fantastical fairytale world full of magic and wonder
[/li][li] Hidden collectibles for extra adventuring
[/li][li] Fun and challenging achievements to unlock
[/li][li] Full language support for English, French, German and Spanish, and optional subtitling for more than 10 languages
[/li][li] Supports NVIDIA 3D Vision [/li][/list][h2]Trine 2 Soundtrack and Artbook Pack[/h2]
Digital Artbook with commentary by Trine 2 artists highlighting the design of levels, enemies, buildings and many environments. Also features an exclusive look at material not used in the final game.

Soundtrack by award-winning Ari Pulkkinen, featuring a total of 30 tracks from Trine 2 and Goblin Menace in MP3 format!

The Digital Artbook will be placed in your Trine 2 folder in the Steam directory:
...Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\Trine 2\\\\Artbook
The Soundtrack will be placed in your Trine 2 folder in the Steam directory:
...Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\Trine 2\\\\Soundtrack
